TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemColors extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別的每個屬性是 結構，這個結構為 Windows 顯示項目的色彩。

span.span: Each property of the class is a structure that is the color of a Windows display element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的屬性達成更佳的效能或類別，而不是建立新的畫筆或筆刷根據從值。Better performance is achieved by using the properties of the or classes rather than creating a new pen or brush based on a value from . 例如，如果您想要取得 3d 項目的表面色彩的筆刷，使用屬性因為它會取得筆刷的已經存在，而呼叫建構函式的參數值與會建立新筆刷。For example, if you wanted to get a brush for the face color of a 3-D element, use the property because it gets a brush that already exists, whereas calling the constructor with a parameter value of will create a new brush. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範運算子和類別。The following code example demonstrates the operator and the class. 這個範例為了搭配 Windows Form 包含名為按鈕`Button1`。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a button named `Button1`. 將下列程式碼貼到您的表單，並將關聯`Button1_Click`方法按鈕之`Click`事件。Paste the following code into your form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為應用程式工作區 (Workspace) 的色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the application workspace.
A that is the color of the application workspace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式工作區是多重文件檢視中沒有被文件佔領的區域。The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的反白色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

value.span: ，為 3D 項目的反白顯示色彩。

span.span: A that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為暗灰色 (Dimmed) 文字的色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of dimmed text.
A that is the color of dimmed text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清單中停用的項目會以暗灰色的文字來顯示。Items in a list that are disabled are displayed in dimmed text.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Drawing.Color Highlight { get; }

Public Shared ReadOnly Property Highlight As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color Highlight { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得 結構，這個結構為選取項目的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the background of selected items.
A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 例如，結構可能會使用清單方塊中選取項目的背景的色彩。For example, the structure may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.

summary.span: 取得 結構，也就是所選項目的文字色彩。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the text of selected items.
A that is the color of the text of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，此色彩用於清單方塊中選取項目的文字。For example, this color is used for the text of selected items in a list box.

span.span: A that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下熱點追蹤的項目會執行該項目。Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
